desc: Web accessibility doesnt only extend to color blind users, but dyslexic users too. Dyslexia is a learning disability that impairs a person's fluency or accuracy in being able to read, write, and spell [10]. As designers, we can help dyslexic users read text better by avoiding the bad design practices that hurt them. Seeing things […]
title: 6 Surprising Bad Practices That Hurt Dyslexic Users
